snippet: "We rent, and we will only rent," said Deirdre Lord, who owns the Megawatt Hour. But the Johnson Security Bureau operates out of a company-owned Bronx townhouse, and its owner, Jessica Johnson, appreciates not having to worry about long-term leases.
abstract: "We rent, and we will only rent," said Deirdre Lord, who owns the Megawatt Hour. But the Johnson Security Bureau operates out of a company-owned Bronx townhouse, and its owner, Jessica Johnson, appreciates not having to worry about long-term leases.

headline.main: Buying Versus Renting, Owners Consider the Advantages
